summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin upload flow with document type selection feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Document Type dropdown displays both options (State Regulation, PMS Report Requests)
User can switch between document types successfully
Backend /api/admin/upload endpoint receives doc_type in FormData
Upload form validation works - requires title and PDF file
Form submit button correctly enabled/disabled based on validation
End-to-end upload functionality works for both document types
Navigation from homepage to admin upload works correctly
